title: Walmart Is a Convenient Target for Opioid Lawsuits; Government shares the blame but can't be shaken down so easily.
text:
Abuse of prescribed opioids is not new. I dispensed small, partial prescription amounts of oxycodone-containing Percodan 60 years ago for an addicted judge whose bailiff picked them up. Government shares the blame. In public health, we encouraged "getting ahead of the pain" and the inaccurate "pain as a fifth vital sign." Governments routinely ignored the same usage data that is available to distributors, and medical educators failed miserably. But neither they nor the Chinese fentanyl providers can be shaken down by lawyers and governments.

Harvey Swenson

Sacramento, Calif.

Walmart Is a Convenient Target for Opioid Lawsuits
